a.xlink:title: Virtual Eventhandler class.
Template for a single GLSL uniform variable.
SLNode represents a node in a hierarchical scene graph.
SLRaytracer hold all the methods for Whitted style Ray Tracing.
Defines a 2D-GUI button with optional submenus as children of the group.
Active or visible camera node class.
Specialized SLNode that represents a single joint (or bone) in a skeleton.
SLLightDirect class for a directional light source.
Light node class for a rectangular light source.
SLLightSpot class for a spot light source.
SLText creates a mesh using a textured font from SLTexFont.
Classic Monte Carlo Pathtracing algorithm for real global illumination.
Abstract Light class for OpenGL light sources.
Base class for all other classes.
Defines a 2D-Background for the OpenGL framebuffer background.
OpenCV image class with the same interface as the former SLImage class.
Encapsulation of an OpenGL shader program object.
Encapsulation of an OpenGL shader object.
Texture object for OpenGL texturing.
This class is deprecated.
Defines a standard CG material with textures and a shader program.
An SLMesh object is a triangulated mesh that is drawn with one draw call.
The SLScene class represents the top level instance holding the scene structure.
SceneView class represents a dynamic real time 3D view onto the scene.
Generic Shader Program class inherited from SLGLProgram.
Texture Font class inherits SLGLTexture for alpha blended font rendering.
Axis aligned box mesh.
Axis aligned coordinate axis mesh.
SLGrid creates a rectangular grid with lines with a certain resolution.
SLPolygon creates a convex polyon mesh.
SLPolyline creates a polyline object.
SLRectangle creates a rectangular mesh with a certain resolution.
SLRevolver is an SLMesh object built out of revolving points.
A triangle class as the most simplest mesh.
SLArrow is creates an arrow mesh based on its SLRevolver methods.
SLCone creates a cone mesh based on SLRevolver.
SLCylinder is creates sphere mesh based on its SLRevolver methods.
SLDisk creates a disk mesh based on SLRevolver.
SLLens creates a lens mesh based on SLRevolver.
SLSphere creates a sphere mesh based on SLRevolver.
SLSphere creates a sphere mesh based on SLRevolver.
SLSphere creates a sphere mesh based on SLSpheric w. 180 deg polar angle.
